title: [BUG] Can't ban on Ranked Draft
body:
So hello. Ranked Draft is live now on PBE, however for some reason I couldn't ban any champion, the ban pick window didn't appear.

http://i.imgur.com/HK6690C.png

As you can see on the image, I couldn't do anything, resulting in a dodge. I have no idea what caused that, nor what could have caused that, I just opened the Alpha Client (PBE) and tried to play a ranked.
Cheers.

replies.body: Same thing happened to me, however i was able to choose the champion i wanted to ban... the ban button was locked. we should be able to do like a hover ban, similar to the how we can pick while hovering when the time runs out.
We know about this and have a fix, you should see it tomorrow! Thanks for the report!
so after seeing this post, will ranked be the next thing we will test as alpha testers?
Same happened to me, reported on PBE boards

What does it mean when this client goes in Beta?

Will it be released so everyone would download it?
